While we are almost dying with FOMO of not being able to catch a glimpse of our favourite couple getting hitched, Ranveer and Deepika are enjoying their grand wedding celebrations in Italy.
The fairytale wedding celebrations kickstarted two days ago with Deepika and Ranveer's family in attendance and the details that have come out prove that the bride and groom are very emotional with so much love and support around them.
Pinterest
Reports claim that Deepika got emotional and broke down during her Sangeet, her better-half Ranveer was seen hugging and making her laugh. These are the stories that reinstate our faith in love and the Constitution of marriage.

We will have to wait until Ranveer and Deepika decide to share the pictures and videos from the wedding for all their fans, their family is not being able to contain their excitement. So much so that Deepika Padukone's sister Anisha changed her bio on both Twitter and Instagram.
Because #LadkiWale is all set to get the two of them hitched!
